name: Techno War
overview: A S.E.U.C.K shareware game by Loz in 1994. A sequel to this shooter called Tech War Mania Mode was released later the same year. You form part of a secret task force known as united freedom undercover operations in technology, code named Necoth, The latest project RAD is just under completion. The laser recharge isn't quite perfected yet but will charge on certain targets. INTRUDER ALERT! All defenses breached. All exits are blocked by the aliens the only way out is to fight your way through.
